person.name: Hemanth GRANDHI
person.objective: The objective of my life is to become an avid programmer, and focus on creating new technology in order to pave a bright future for the future generations.I always follow the motto of PwC, which is to 'Build trust in the society and solve important problems!'

job.jobcontent: Worked on various projects regarding IoT, front end development,Microsoft azure platform,etc.Learned different coding skills from HTML,CSS and JS.Built strong relationshipswith the other employees and learnt important leadership skills.

Worked on Android Development and learnt the basics of Java Programming. Was mentored by a guide who taught us how to make a basic android application using Eclipse IDE.With the help of the guide,I developed an Android application to manage an Online Pharmacy.

education.educationcontent: Did my Bachelors of Technology at Vellore Institute of Technology, Vellore. I majored in Computer Science and passed out with a CGPA of 8.6.
Did my 11th and 12th in Narayana group of institutions and took coaching there for IIT.
